Package Controller

Class AlertController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AlertController
public class AlertController
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to show alerts to the user and sometimes exit the application if necessary.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AlertController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private static void createAlert​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content, javafx.scene.control.Alert alert)
    Creates and shows an alert.
    static void showStageError​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content)
    Shows an error alert to the user without quitting the application.
    static void showStageError​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content, boolean hasToQuit)
    Shows an error alert to the user and quits the application in certain cases.
    static void showStageInfo​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content)
    Shows an information alert to the user.

      public AlertController()

  • Method Details

    • showStageError

      public static void showStageError​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content)
      Shows an error alert to the user without quitting the application.
      Parameters:
      header - Header of the alert
      content - Content of the alert message

    • showStageError

      public static void showStageError​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content, boolean hasToQuit)
      Shows an error alert to the user and quits the application in certain cases.
      Parameters:
      header - Header of the alert
      content - Content of the alert message
      hasToQuit - If true, quits the application after showing the alert.

    • showStageInfo

      public static void showStageInfo​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content)
      Shows an information alert to the user.
      Parameters:
      header - Header of the alert
      content - Content of the alert message

    • createAlert

      private static void createAlert​(java.lang.String header, java.lang.String content, javafx.scene.control.Alert alert)
      Creates and shows an alert.
      Parameters:
      header - Header of the alert
      content - Content of the alert message
      alert - Alert to create and show
